title: Cream Caramel Ichigo Milk
original_name: クリームキャラメル苺みるく
sinopse:
From Aerandria Scans:

Mikoto, a high school student who lives alone in an old apartment, and Murakami-san, a university student who lives in the next room, are a couple. She should expect every day to be lovey-dovey with her boyfriend, yet troubles after troubles keep on happening!?
